If there were some sort of catalyst I would be okay with it, like the husband cheating or her being taken advantage of. But she literally has a great life and decided to cheat because she felt like it. Hentai infidelity is alright because it's so absurd, however this one was a tad too realistic, and because of that I couldn't enjoy it.

The writing/plot (aside from the TL being not up to some people's standards) was mediocre. The drawing was okay I guess. Like most NTR the plots are fairly repetitive/similar. Outside of the extreme/graphic ones when you see one you've basically seen them all.
